description.en: A cute, baby, Luia that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.ar: A cute, baby, Luia that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.br: Um lindo bebê Luia que segue seu mestre e coleta itens caídos
description.cns: 一只可爱的火鸟宝宝跟随它的主人并捡起周围掉落的物品。
description.de: Ein süßes Luia, das dir überall hin folgt und Gegenstände für dich aufsammelt.
description.fi: A cute, baby, Luia that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.fil: A cute, baby, Luia that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.fr: Fait apparaître un mignon bébé Luia qui suit son invocateur partout et qui ramasse les objets laissés par les ennemis.
description.id: Luia mungil nan imut yang setia mengikuti tuannya berkeliling dan mengambil setiap drop yang dijatuhkan
description.it: A cute, baby, Luia that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.jp: リトル・ルイアを召喚させ、ドロップしたアイテムを拾ってくれる収集ペット
description.kr: 영계 루이아를 소환하거나 해제합니다. 소환 하였을 시, 주변에 있는 아이템을 자동 습득하게 됩니다.
description.nl: A cute, baby, Luia that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.pl: A cute, baby, Luia that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.ru: Очаровательный птенец лавлина, который послушно семенит за хозяином и подбирает предметы.
description.sp: Una linda bebé Luia que sigue a su dueño y recoge los objetos soltados.
description.sw: A cute, baby, Luia that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.th: Luiaผู้น่ารักที่ตามเจ้านายของมันไปรอบๆ และหยิบไอเทมที่ดรอปลงมา
description.tw: 解除召喚優秀的小火雞
description.vi: Luia, đứa bé dễ thương, đi theo chủ nhân của nó và nhặt những món đồ bị đánh rơi.
